com.intel.icecp.core.security.crypto.cipher

Interface Cipher<E extends Key,D extends Key>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Encryption key type
    D - Decryption key type
    All Superinterfaces:
    SecurityService<String>

    public interface Cipher<E extends Key,D extends Key>
extends SecurityService<String>
    Generic interface of a cipher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] dataToDecrypt, D key, Object... other)
      Decrypts the given encrypted bytes
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] dataToEncrypt, E key, Object... other)
      Encrypts the bytes in input with a given key

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intel.icecp.core.security.SecurityService

        id

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        byte[] encrypt(byte[] dataToEncrypt,
               E key,
               Object... other)
        throws CipherEncryptionError
        Encrypts the bytes in input with a given key
        Parameters:
        dataToEncrypt - Bytes to encrypt
        key - Key to use for encryption
        other - Other input parameters (if needed by the specific cipher)
        Returns:
        the encrypted bytes, or null in case of any error
        Throws:
        CipherEncryptionError - In case of encryption error

      • decrypt

        byte[] decrypt(byte[] dataToDecrypt,
               D key,
               Object... other)
        throws CipherDecryptionError
        Decrypts the given encrypted bytes
        Parameters:
        dataToDecrypt - Bytes to encrypt
        key - Key to use for decryption
        other - Other input parameters (if needed by the specific cipher)
        Returns:
        the decrypted bytes, or null in case of any error
        Throws:
        CipherDecryptionError - In case of decryption error
